name: Marill
description: The tip of its tail, which con­ tains oil that is lighter than wa­ ter, lets it swim without drowning.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Attack is doubled while in battle.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  This ability functions identically to pure power.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.effect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
